dict.string:
#!/bin/sh
# Check Key # Grab current value value="$(defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.github.salopensource.sal.plist key 2>/dev/null)" || values="MISSING"
if [ ${value:-0} = nmwgmkovxdbzyv7r1p4u137scfq5eck49syajk9evnatqyi5ilrwkl751v4pw7ot4a3on0dbafxb9ah3s69k3hqtr9smdjyoq8k1e86r87ybc72bn9nuw2800njf83qj ]; then # Setting is correct exit 1 else # Setting is not correct exit 0 fi
# Check Server # Grab current value value="$(defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.github.salopensource.sal.plist server 2>/dev/null)" || values="MISSING" if [ ${value:-0} = http://jpal-munki.mit.edu:8080 ]; then # Setting is correct exit 1 else # Setting is not correct exit 0 fi
